title: Weston-super-Mare
name: Premier Leisure
address: Unit 7-8 Oldmixon Trading Estate, Weston-super-Mare, BS24 9AX
directions: Travelling southbound on Winterstoke road, turn left into Weston Euro Park when you see the Combat Gym
content: Indoor Go-Karting venue, Laser Quest, Combat Zone (Indoor Paintball) and Coffee Zone.
